original_title: Bette Midler: Ol' Red Hair Is Back
overview: In 1977,  Bette Midler's first television special premiered, featuring guest stars Dustin Hoffman and Emmett Kelly. It went on to win Bette her first Emmy Award for Outstanding Special â€” Comedy-Variety or Music.  To make the show palatable to home viewers, the special featured heavily cleaned up versions of the material Midler was  performing at that time on stage. The title of the show, Ol' Red Hair is Back, was a takeoff on the title of Frank Sinatra's recent album Ol' Blue Eyes Is Back.
title: Bette Midler: Ol' Red Hair Is Back
